title: Technology Integration Design Workshop for Elementary Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Fundamental Mathematics Education Theory and Mathematics Curriculum Content
context.additional_context: Strengthening technology integration skills aligned with elementary math curriculum in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Select and apply at least three digital tools (iPad apps, web-based resources, etc.) suitable for interdisciplinary integrated lesson design in actual classroom settings.
Develop at least two technology-integrated strategies that promote higher-order thinking (critical thinking, creativity) when designing math-centered interdisciplinary projects.
Complete one VR/simulation-based lesson scenario executable in resource-limited environments and revise it based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
